song_name: Lagrange Point - Searching for the Promise Land
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Lagrange Point - Searching for the Promise Land is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
Lagrange Point - Searching for the Promise Land is written in the key of C Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most common key in all of popular music.
